title: 4iiii Shimano crank recall: Keeping riders safe and in the saddle
content:
Customers with 4iiii power meter Shimano cranks that are affected by the recall will be covered and able to get the replacement with a new 4iiii unit.

Read the full article at 4iiii Shimano crank recall: Keeping riders safe and in the saddle on Velo.
author: Troy Templin
